Title: Wpf Touch Enabled List View
Description: A simple control that inherits from WPF standard listview to handle some mouse event for support on touch screen.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This is a simple WPF control that inherits from ListView and add some movement effects with drag and drop. It is meant to be used in touch screen environment.

Some details can be found Here: http://www.codewrecks.com/blog/index.php/2010/12/20/wpf-listview-with-better-touch-support/

Currently there is no fixed release, just grab the code for the control and make whathever u want with it. :)

The code is based and inspired by these two articles.
http://www.codeproject.com/KB/WPF/DraggableListView.aspx/
http://www.codeproject.com/KB/WPF/DraggableListView.aspx/
